data.title: To Tell the Truth/Episode Guide
data.meta_description: This guide covers the CBS Primetime Series, which ran from December 1956 to September 1966, and again from December 1966 to May 1967. Go Back to: To Tell the Truth Advance to: To Tell the Truth/CBS Daytime Episode Guide (1962–1968)
data.text:
